DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether maintain apical patency cause postoperative pain teeth necrotic pulp apical periodontitis .
DOC.detailed_description: Apical patency ( AP ) procedure prevent accumulation soft hard tissue debris within cement canal . However , RCTs indicate maintain AP cause postoperative pain , whilst RCTs point difference term pain AP perform . We , therefore , would like conduct RCT increase sample size previously perform RCTs systematic review .
DOC.criteria: Mature permanent teeth plural necrosis apical periodontitis Systemic disorder Diabetes Pregnancy Less 18 year age Immunocompromised Patients take antibiotic past 1 month Patients positive history analgesic use within past 3 day Previously access teeth
